title: Pishgu: Universal Path Prediction Network Architecture for Real-time Cyber-physical Edge Systems. (arXiv:2210.08057v3 [cs.CV] UPDATED)
abstract: Path prediction is an essential task for many real-world Cyber-Physical Systems (CPS) applications, from autonomous driving and traffic monitoring/management to pedestrian/worker safety. These real-world CPS applications need a robust, lightweight path prediction that can provide a universal network architecture for multiple subjects (e.g., pedestrians and vehicles) from different perspectives. However, most existing algorithms are tailor-made for a unique subject with a specific camera perspective and scenario. This article presents Pishgu, a universal lightweight network architecture, as a robust and holistic solution for path prediction. Pishgu's architecture can adapt to multiple path prediction domains with different subjects (vehicles, pedestrians), perspectives (bird's-eye, high-angle), and scenes (sidewalk, highway). ret.translated_title: Pishgu: 用于实时物理边缘系统的通用路径预测网络架构
ret.translated_abstract: 路径预测是许多现实世界物理边缘系统（CPS）应用的重要任务，从自主驾驶和交通监控/管理到行人/工人安全。这些现实世界的CPS应用需要一个强大的、轻量级的路径预测，能够为多个主题（例如行人和车辆）从不同的角度提供通用的网络架构。然而，大多数现有的算法都是为特定主题和特定摄像机角度和场景量身定制的。本文介绍了Pishgu，一种通用的轻量级网络架构，作为路径预测的强大和全面的解决方案。Pishgu的架构可以适应多个路径预测领域，具有不同的主题（车辆、行人）、视角（鸟瞰、高角度）和场景（人行道、公路）。我们提出的架构通过利用图同构网络和注意力模块在每帧中捕获主体之间的相互依赖关系。
ret.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为Pishgu的通用轻量级网络架构，用于路径预测。Pishgu的架构可以适应多个路径预测领域，具有不同的主题、视角和场景，并通过图同构网络和注意力模块捕获主体之间的相互依赖关系。
